<js>
var n;

((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){
n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
if(/page/.test(baseUrl)){
	list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
	}else{
		list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.split(",")[0]+'&page='+i+',{"webView":true}'});
		}
}
}else if(!result.match(/返回列表/)){
	list=""
	}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>

var e = b.substring(16);

}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>
